news.heroSubtitle: A 3D frosted-glass feed tracking every breakthrough
news.heroDescription: Dive into a landscape dashboard built for large screens yet fluid on mobile. The card-based feed refreshes endlessly in reverse chronology so your next AI insight is always one scroll away.
news.noDataDesc: Please refresh in a moment or contact the operations team.
news.scrollHint: Scroll downward to unlock each insight in reverse chronological order
news.infiniteHint: The feed loops automatically to keep the spotlight on key events
